name: AWS Fundamentals
description: Core concepts and services of Amazon Web Services

definitions.beginner: AWS is Amazon's cloud computing platform that provides web services like virtual servers, storage, and databases over the internet.
definitions.advanced: AWS is a comprehensive cloud computing platform offering Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS) with global data centers, extensive service portfolio, and pay-as-you-use pricing model.

commands.description: Configure AWS credentials and default settings
Get current AWS account and user information

examples.title: Setting up AWS CLI
examples.description: Install and configure AWS CLI for command-line access
examples.code:
# Install AWS CLI
pip install awscli

# Configure credentials
aws configure
# AWS Access Key ID: YOUR_ACCESS_KEY
# AWS Secret Access Key: YOUR_SECRET_KEY
# Default region name: us-east-1
# Default output format: json
